name: Asylamba: Influence (itch)
description:
Asylamba : Influence is a strategy game combining skills and reflection on a futuristic and refined interface. You play the leader of a faction that must extends the culture of his empire over the galaxy.

At the beginning of a mission, the empire is composed of a single solar system. It will be necessary to use Great Characters (savant, priest, artist or merchant) to spread the culture of the kingdom on other systems. The zone of influence will then grow, with all that it generates: increase of the partisans, increase of power, more possibilities.

But be careful, it's necessary to maintain this cultural influence so that it persists! Different factions are engaged in this "war" of influence.

A Steam Greenlight is on its way. If you like what you see, support us on the campaign page HERE
